lead_paragraph: Italy coach Giampiero Ventura faces an injury headache as midfielder Claudio Marchisio, striker Manolo Gabbiadini and defender Andrea Barzagli have all been ruled out with injuries from Saturday's World Cup qualifier against Liechtenstein.

headline.print_headline: Italy's Injury Woes Mount as Marchisio, Gabbiadini and Barzagli Ruled Out
headline.main: Italy's Injury Woes Mount as Marchisio, Gabbiadini and Barzagli Ruled Out

snippet: Italy coach Giampiero Ventura faces an injury headache as midfielder Claudio Marchisio, striker Manolo Gabbiadini and defender Andrea Barzagli have all been ruled out with injuries from Saturday's World Cup qualifier against Liechtenstein....
